alert.note: Alert for Summit (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 1:18PM EST until January 14 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM FRIDAY TO 1 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches in the northwest portion of Summit County. * WHERE...Summit county. * WHEN...From 1 AM Friday to 1 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The main impacts in Summit County will be northwest of Akron. A widespread inch or two of snowfall will be expected tonight and transition to lake effect snow with a couple more inches expected on Friday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
